price: 21. Botosi mpe liloba ya malamu. Mpe soki motindo mozuami тропа likambo (ya bitumba) ezalaki malamu тропа bango bandimela Allah тропа likambo yango.
arabic: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ṭāʿatun waqawlun maʿrūfun fa-idhā ʿazama al-amru falaw ṣadaqū al-laha lakāna khayran lahum
